The claim was made by the World Food Pro: a reputable organization that is actively involved in addressing global hunger and food waste issues.
The claim was based on a report from the: N. Food and Agriculture Organization, which provided data and calculations on the emissions resulting from food wastage.
The claim was initially supported by a t: stating that food waste is the 3rd largest contributor of greenhouse gas emissions.
The claim was later retracted and delete: acknowledging that they mistook the metaphorical representation of food waste as a country for an actual source of waste.
